attributes.action: Speed up the process of buying and selling a house
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year, my house buyer has pulled out after 5 months of legal bettling - this has cost me thousands, as with others i know. 
Please listen, when we ask that we must put a system in place that is practical, to ensure any propery sale or purchase is completed within a fixed duration, IE 2-3 months

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
